description: La Liste HS Hooded Jacket Men. A hard shell ski jacket with robust yet light 3-layer freeride material with Gore-Tex® C-Knit backer for maximum comfort. The helmet-compatible hood contributes to the cool freeride look. The collar can be expanded via two zipper inserts to accommodate a scarf or helmet straps and so provides more freedom of movement around the neck area.
name: Mammut La Liste HS Hooded Jacket - Mens
